main_page.main_page_1: Welcome to celebrate the 25th jubilee of the Guild of Information Networks, Athene!
main_page.main_page_2: Throughout the year, guild members will have the opportunity to delve into Athen's history and participate in historical guild events.
main_page.main_page_3: In honor of the jubilee, numerous events and activities will be organized for both guild members and the entire Otaniemi community. The celebratory year culminates in November / December with Infoähky!
main_page.main_page_6: JOIN US IN MAKING THIS JUBILEE

event_headers.header_2: Here you can find all the events of the jubilee!

events_0.information: The jubilee kicks off with a bang on Monday 8th of January when the Athene 25 committee will set the table with Athene XXV fabulous year opening brunch. So come and start the year with a treat with your guildmates and find out what the year has in store!

for_guild.text_0: All guild members are welcome to join us in making this jubilee memorable. If you want to organize an event as a part of the jubilee,
for_guild.text_2: to arrange it. Both the committee and guild will support you in organizing events, so please contact us and participate in making this year amazing!

ball.text1: Athene's 25th annual ball, Infoähky XXV, will be celebrated later in the year - more information closer to the event
